body: At 2nd level, a desert druid gains a bonus on Initiative checks and Knowledge (geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival checks equal to 1/2 her druid level in desert terrain, and she cannot be tracked in such environments. This ability replaces woodland stride.
name: Desert Native
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Desert Druid/Desert Native
